title: AlexBuckland
author: AlexBuckland
content: Hey my name is Alex Buckland I posted this video once here before but it about sums everything up https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YTqt2klvvLwAsk me anything! I'm about to be a billionaire. It's fantastic!!

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: Seriously, I think you should seek help. The feelings of fear, anxiety, and paranoia are coming from inside your head and are not caused by other people. Try talking about your fears with a therapist. It will help a lot.As for someone turning you gay, that can't happen if you don't want it, so you really have nothing to worry about. It's your unrealistic concern is the real problem.

comments.author: AndreiGeep
comments.body: Are you sure, you are about to become a billionaire???I think no one, and I mean no one, becomes a billionaire in this world unless they sold their soul to the devil (99.99%).He (the devil) won't let that happen, give his riches for nothing???And if you sold your soul to the devil, than you won't be a billionaire anyways - you know why??? =Â  because he'll probably send you to hell and send one of his true spirit followers into your body and that entity will do what the devil tells it to do with his riches!!!Just for thought...
